item:6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac1.value: {"id": "6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac1", "type": "positive", "title": "Verify Page Loads Successfully", "description": "Ensure that the YouTube homepage loads without errors and displays content.", "expected_result": "The page loads completely, and content is visible without errors.", "steps": ["Open a new browser window.", "Navigate to https://youtube.com.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Check that the page status is 200 (OK).", "Verify that the page contains visible content (e.g., videos, navigation elements)."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:03.589000+00:00"}

item:6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac2.value: {"id": "6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac2", "type": "negative", "title": "Verify Page Loads with Invalid URL", "description": "Test the behavior when navigating to a malformed YouTube URL.", "expected_result": "The browser displays a 404 or error page.", "steps": ["Open a new browser window.", "Navigate to https://youtube.com/invalidpage.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Verify that an error message or 404 page is displayed."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:03.748000+00:00"}

item:6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac3.value: {"id": "6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac3", "type": "positive", "title": "Verify Page Title", "description": "Check that the page title is set (even if it is 'Untitled').", "expected_result": "The page title is 'Untitled'.", "steps": ["Open https://youtube.com in a new browser window.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Read the page title from the browser tab.", "Verify that the page title is exactly 'Untitled'."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:03.903000+00:00"}

item:6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac4.value: {"id": "6960f93fc8706ce44fd57ac4", "type": "positive", "title": "Verify Page Loads with Disabled JavaScript", "description": "Test the homepage rendering when JavaScript is disabled in the browser.", "expected_result": "The page loads, but dynamic content may be missing or display a warning.", "steps": ["Open browser settings and disable JavaScript.", "Navigate to https://youtube.com.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Verify whether any warning or fallback content is displayed."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:03.962000+00:00"}

item:6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac5.value: {"id": "6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac5", "type": "negative", "title": "Verify Page Loads with Slow Network", "description": "Test YouTube homepage loading under slow network conditions.", "expected_result": "The page loads eventually or displays a timeout/error message.", "steps": ["Open browser developer tools.", "Set the network speed to 'Slow 3G'.", "Navigate to https://youtube.com.", "Wait up to 60 seconds for the page to load.", "Verify if the page loads or an error/timeout is displayed."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:04.153000+00:00"}

item:6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac6.value: {"id": "6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac6", "type": "positive", "title": "Verify HTTPS Security", "description": "Ensure that the homepage is served over HTTPS and the certificate is valid.", "expected_result": "The page is served over HTTPS with a valid certificate.", "steps": ["Open https://youtube.com in a new browser window.", "Check the browser's address bar for a lock icon.", "Verify that no security warnings are displayed.", "Inspect the certificate details to ensure it is valid."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:04.360000+00:00"}

item:6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac7.value: {"id": "6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac7", "type": "positive", "title": "Verify Page Loads with Unsupported Browser", "description": "Test homepage loading using an outdated or unsupported browser user agent.", "expected_result": "The page loads or displays a warning about browser compatibility.", "steps": ["Set the browser user agent to Internet Explorer 9.", "Navigate to https://youtube.com.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Verify if the page displays a compatibility warning or loads with degraded functionality."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:04.542000+00:00"}

item:6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac8.value: {"id": "6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac8", "type": "negative", "title": "Verify No Forms Present on Homepage", "description": "Ensure that there are no forms present on the homepage as per detected features.", "expected_result": "No form elements are present in the DOM.", "steps": ["Open https://youtube.com in a new browser window.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Search the DOM for any <form> elements.", "Verify that no <form> elements are found."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:04.600000+00:00"}

item:6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac9.value: {"id": "6960f940c8706ce44fd57ac9", "type": "positive", "title": "Verify Page Loads After Clearing Cookies and Cache", "description": "Test homepage loading after clearing all browser cookies and cache.", "expected_result": "The page loads successfully and displays content.", "steps": ["Clear all cookies and cache in the browser.", "Open https://youtube.com.", "Wait for the page to finish loading.", "Verify that the homepage content is visible and loads without errors."], "created_at": "2026-01-09 12:49:04.751000+00:00"}
